### **Recaudo Vigilancia - Enero 2025**


```{r setup, include=FALSE, }
library(dplyr)
library(knitr)
library(ggplot2)

data <- read.csv("recaudo02-2025.csv")


# Calculando los totales
recaudo_total <- data %>% 
  mutate(total = pago1 + pago2)

total_quincena1 <- sum(data$pago1, na.rm = TRUE)
total_quincena2 <- sum(data$pago2, na.rm = TRUE)
total_general <- total_quincena1+total_quincena2
```



```{r, echo=FALSE}
names(data) <- c("Placa", "Nombre", "Primera quincena", "Segunda quincena")

kable(data)
```



```{r, echo=FALSE}
kable(data.frame(
  TOTALES = c("Total Primera Quincena", "Total Segunda Quincena", "Recaudo Total"),
  Valor = c(total_quincena1, total_quincena2, total_general)
))
```
